c.detail: A tile labyrinth covers the floor
c.summary: A tile labyrinth covers the floor

e.detail:
Symbol of Hypnosis: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within 10 ft., DC 11 save or become incapacitated for 1d4 rounds

details.history: The dungeon was created by dwarves as a tomb. It was eventually abandoned by its creators, and the dungeon has lain empty for many centuries until recently.
details.illumination: Average (shadowy in corridors, lamps or torches in most rooms)
details.temperature:
Very Hot (DC 10 Constitution save each hour
    or gain one level of exhaustion)

east.desc: Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

west.desc: Trapped and Locked Iron Door (DC 15 to open, DC 30 to break; 60 hp)
west.trap:
Rune of Confusion: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within 10 ft., DC 10 save or become confused (phb 224) for 1d4 rounds

detail.room_features: A well lies in the west side of the room, and a ruined gauntlet lies in the west side of the room
A magical mosaic on the south wall can be used to scry upon any known individual within the dungeon, and someone has scrawled "Never trust an elf" in dwarvish runes on the west wall

east.desc: Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 15 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)

hidden_treasure: Hidden (DC 15 to find) Trapped and Locked Iron Chest (DC 20 to unlock, DC 30 to break; 60 hp)

Ice Dart Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +9 to hit against one target, 4d10 cold damage

2100 cp, 1400 sp, 110 gp, azurite (10 gp), lapis lazuli (10 gp), malachite (10 gp), moss agate (10 gp), rhodochrosite (10 gp), Spell Scroll (Plant Growth) (uncommon, dmg 200), Dust of Sneezing and Choking (uncommon, dmg 166), Philter of Love (uncommon, dmg 184)
monster: Treasure: 2200 cp, 800 sp, 110 gp, a brocade choker threaded with silver (25 gp), a cloth coat threaded with dyed silk (25 gp), a jasper salt cellar engraved with a labyrinth (25 gp), a leather saddle tooled with draconic scales (25 gp), a pewter scepter etched with arcane runes (25 gp), Potion of Healing (common, dmg 187)
trap:
Rune of Paralyzation: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within 10 ft., DC 11 save or become paralyzed for 1d4 rounds

contents.summary: Gelatinous Cube, Rune of Paralyzation, Hidden Treasure

north.desc: Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)

south.desc: Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)
Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

west.desc: Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)

monster: Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Half-ogre (cr 1, mm 238); deadly, 300 xp
detail.room_features: A large demonic idol with ruby eyes sits in the south side of the room, and rusting iron spikes line the east and west walls

west.desc: Trapped and Stuck Stone Door (DC 20 to break; 60 hp) (slides down)
west.trap:
Symbol of Panic: DC 15 to find, DC 20 to disable;
    affects all targets within 10 ft., DC 10 save or become frightened for 1d4 rounds

wandering_monsters.1: Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166) and 1 x Giant Rat (cr 1/8, mm 327); easy, 75 xp, wandering senselessly
wandering_monsters.2: Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316) and 1 x Zombie (cr 1/4, mm 316); deadly, 500 xp, wandering senselessly
wandering_monsters.3: Gelatinous Cube (cr 2, mm 242); deadly, 450 xp, hunting for food
wandering_monsters.4: 4 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); deadly, 200 xp, hunting for food
wandering_monsters.5: Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316) and 1 x Zombie (cr 1/4, mm 316); deadly, 500 xp, hunting for food
wandering_monsters.6: Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Half-ogre (cr 1, mm 238); deadly, 300 xp, trying to lure the party into an ambush
